intents.name: greet
responses: Hello! I'm {name}'s assistant. How can I help today?
Hi there! I'm the {name} support bot—ask me about orders, warranty, hours, or store location.

intents.name: warranty
responses: {name} devices include a 1-year limited warranty for manufacturing defects. Want the claim steps?
We provide a 1-year warranty. Keep your invoice handy for claims.

intents.name: order_status
responses: Can you share your order ID? I'll help track it.
Tracking order… please provide your order number.

intents.name: location
responses: We’re online-first with pickup at {pickup}. Need directions?
Pickups happen at {pickup}. Home delivery is available too.

intents.name: contact
responses: You can reach a human at {phone} or {email}.
Want to talk to a person? Call {phone} or email {email}.

intents.name: goodbye
responses: Bye! If you need anything else, just ask.
See you! Happy to help anytime.

fallbacks: Sorry, I didn’t quite get that. Could you rephrase?
I'm not sure yet. Try asking about orders, warranty, hours, pickup location, or how to contact support.
